instruction: How do I build a Flutter APK with flavor 1?
response: command: flutter build apk --dart-define=HOSTNAME=unuk-master --dart-define=PROXY=11.11.11 flavor hms

instruction: How do I build a Flutter IPA for iOS?
response: command: flutter build ipa --dart-define=IOS=unuk-master flavor IOS
